discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The GREATEST risk associated with replacing nightly batch processing backup with real-time replication is the potential inability to recover from cybersecurity attacks effectively. Real-time replication may replicate malicious activities in real-time, making it crucial to implement robust cybersecurity measures to protect both the primary and replicated data from cyber threats.

questions.question_text: During an IT governance review, an IS auditor finds that all IT expenditures are included as a single line item in the enterprise-wide budget. Which of the following documentation would provide the BEST evidence for evaluating how IT expenditures support business objectives?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The IT steering committee is typically responsible for overseeing IT strategy and ensuring that IT initiatives align with business objectives. Therefore, approval from the IT steering committee indicates that IT expenditures have been evaluated in terms of their contribution to achieving business goals.
